com.george.als.data
Class ReadFile

java.lang.Object
  com.george.als.data.ReadFile

public class ReadFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class is in charge of reading text files from memory It is used to load the map and bug from a file This is done through the methods loadMap and loadBugs

Author:
Georges Beast
